posts.postText:
Welcome, everyone! Currently, this server is running the gamemode ReDead.
If you want the content pack, get it here:

 http://www.garrysmod.org/img/?t=dll&id=35307  

Download the current map here:

 http://www.garrysmod.org/img/?t=dll&id=36132  

You're free to join, but server restarts and updates will be happening.
The hell?  What is this and where is my makeshift fallout?

All I have to say is, within the next two weeks, 

ReDead removed. Welcome: "something else".

I think redead is pretty cool, but needs to be more populated, players need a reason play (*AHEM* points)
Otherwise TTT will be the more appealing option
I love the map so much.
